title: AWS Solutions Library | Amazon Web Services | AWS
content: Organizations today are in search of vetted solutions and architectural guidance to rapidly solve business challenges. Whether customers prefer off-the-shelf deployments, or customizable architectures, the AWS Solutions Library carries solutions built by AWS and AWS Partners for a broad range of industry and technology use cases.  Purpose-built cloud products  Ready-to-deploy solutions assembling AWS Services, code, and configurations  Software, SaaS, or managed services from AWS Partners  Prescriptive architectural diagrams, sample code, and technical content  Public Sector
